comments:
Build ID: 3.3

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Have this CU:
package foo;

public class CU {
	
	private String field;

	public CU(String field) {
		this.field = field;
	}

	public String getField() {
		return field;
	}
	
}

2. Invoke 'Extract Superclass', name the superclass 'A'
3. Do *not* select 'Use the extracted class...'
4. Select the field and getter, and perform finish
5. You will end up with a superclass A:
package foo;

public class A {

	public A() {
		super();
	}

}

and a subclass CU:

package foo;

public class CU extends A {
	
	public CU(String field) {
		this.field = field;
	}
	
}

Both, the field and method declarations got lost somewhere.

More information:
This might be unrelated but when I select elements from the treeviewer in the compare page, I get this exception:
